verses.verse: And the men <WH582> of Kiryat-Ye`arim <WH7157> came <WH935> <WH8799>, and fetched up <WH5927> <WH8686> the ark <WH727> of the YY <WH3068>, and brought <WH935> <WH8686> it into the house <WH1004> of Abinadab <WH41> in the hill <WH1389>, and sanctified <WH6942> <WH8765> Eleazar <WH499> his son <WH1121> to keep <WH8104> <WH8800> the ark <WH727> of the YY <WH3068>.

And it came to pass, while <WH3117> the ark <WH727> abode <WH3427> <WH8800> in Kiryat-Ye`arim <WH7157>, that the time <WH3117> was long <WH7235> <WH8799>; for it was twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141>: and all the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> lamented <WH5091> <WH8735> after <WH310> the YY <WH3068>.

And SH'mu'el <WH8050> spake <WH559> <WH8799> unto all the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, If ye do return <WH7725> <WH8802> unto the YY <WH3068> with all your hearts <WH3824>, then put away <WH5493> <WH8685> the strange <WH5236> 'elohim <WH430> and Ashtaroth <WH6252> from among <WH8432> you, and prepare <WH3559> <WH8685> your hearts <WH3824> unto the YY <WH3068>, and serve <WH5647> <WH8798> him only: and he will deliver <WH5337> <WH8686> you out of the hand <WH3027> of the Philistines <WH6430>.
Then the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> did put away <WH5493> <WH8686> Baalim <WH1168> and Ashtaroth <WH6252>, and served <WH5647> <WH8799> the YY <WH3068> only.
And SH'mu'el <WH8050> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Gater <WH6908> <WH8798> all Yisra'EL <WH3478> to Mizpeh <WH4708>, and I will pray <WH6419> <WH8691> for you unto the YY <WH3068>.

And they gathered together <WH6908> <WH8735> to Mizpeh <WH4709>, and drew <WH7579> <WH8799> water <WH4325>, and poured it out <WH8210> <WH8799> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>, and fasted <WH6684> <WH8799> on that day <WH3117>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> there, We have sinned <WH2398> <WH8804> against the YY <WH3068>. And SH'mu'el <WH8050> judged <WH8199> <WH8799> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> in Mizpeh <WH4708>.

And when the Philistines <WH6430> heard <WH8085> <WH8799> that the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> were gathered together <WH6908> <WH8694> to Mizpeh <WH4708>, the lords <WH5633> of the Philistines <WH6430> went up <WH5927> <WH8799> against Yisra'EL <WH3478>. And when the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> heard <WH8085> <WH8799> it, they were afraid <WH3372> <WH8799> of <WH6440> the Philistines <WH6430>.

And the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> said <WH559> <WH8799> to SH'mu'el <WH8050>, Cease <WH2790> <WH8686> not to cry <WH2199> <WH8800> unto the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430> for us, that he will save <WH3467> <WH8686> us out of the hand <WH3027> of the Philistines <WH6430>.

And SH'mu'el <WH8050> took <WH3947> <WH8799> a <WH259> sucking <WH2461> lamb <WH2924>, and offered <WH5927> <WH8686> it for a burnt offering <WH5930> wholly <WH3632> unto the YY <WH3068>: and SH'mu'el <WH8050> cried <WH2199> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068> for Yisra'EL <WH3478>; and the YY <WH3068> heard <WH6030> <WH8799> him.

And as SH'mu'el <WH8050> was offering up <WH5927> <WH8688> the burnt offering <WH5930>, the Philistines <WH6430> drew near <WH5066> <WH8738> to battle <WH4421> against Yisra'EL <WH3478>: but the YY <WH3068> thundered <WH7481> <WH8686> with a great <WH1419> thunder <WH6963> on that day <WH3117> upon the Philistines <WH6430>, and discomfited <WH2000> <WH8799> them; and they were smitten <WH5062> <WH8735> before <WH6440> Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And the men <WH582> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> went out <WH3318> <WH8799> of Mizpeh <WH4709>, and pursued <WH7291> <WH8799> the Philistines <WH6430>, and smote <WH5221> <WH8686> them, until they came under Bethcar <WH1033>.

Then SH'mu'el <WH8050> took <WH3947> <WH8799> a <WH259> stone <WH68>, and set <WH7760> <WH8799> it between Mizpeh <WH4709> and Shen <WH8129>, and called <WH7121> <WH8799> the name <WH8034> of it Ebenezer <WH72>, saying <WH559> <WH8799>, Hitherto hath the YY <WH3068> helped <WH5826> <WH8804> us.

So the Philistines <WH6430> were subdued <WH3665> <WH8735>, and they came <WH935> <WH8800> no more <WH3254> <WH8804> into the coast <WH1366> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>: and the hand <WH3027> of the YY <WH3068> was against the Philistines <WH6430> all the days <WH3117> of SH'mu'el <WH8050>.

And the cities <WH5892> which the Philistines <WH6430> had taken <WH3947> <WH8804> from Yisra'EL <WH3478> were restored <WH7725> <WH8799> to Yisra'EL <WH3478>, from Ekron <WH6138> even unto Gat <WH1661>; and the coasts <WH1366> thereof did Yisra'EL <WH3478> deliver <WH5337> <WH8689> out of the hands <WH3027> of the Philistines <WH6430>. And there was peace <WH7965> between Yisra'EL <WH3478> and the Amorites <WH567>.
And SH'mu'el <WH8050> judged <WH8199> <WH8799> Yisra'EL <WH3478> all the days <WH3117> of his life <WH2416>.

And he went <WH1980> <WH8804> from <WH1767> year <WH8141> to year <WH8141> in circuit <WH5437> <WH8804> to Beit-El <WH1008>, and Gilgal <WH1537>, and Mizpeh <WH4709>, and judged <WH8199> <WH8804> Yisra'EL <WH3478> in all those places <WH4725>.

And his return <WH8666> was to Ramah <WH7414>; for there was his house <WH1004>; and there he judged <WH8199> <WH8804> Yisra'EL <WH3478>; and there he built <WH1129> <WH8799> an altar <WH4196> unto the YY <WH3068>.
